channel.title: New runescape combat
channel.description:
http://services.runescape.com/m=news/the-evolution-of-combat-beta-sign-up Will this be a success or failure for Jagex? I think this is going to ruin rs even more..
[img]http://services.runescape.com/m=rswikiimages/en/2012/5/combat1-18140712.jpg[/img] Is that a gun I see?

item.title: New runescape combat
item.dc:creator: @the_wanderer The Wanderer
item.description:
@the_wanderer wrote:

[quote=“sinisoul, post:126, topic:442564”][quote author=The Wanderer link=topic=545250.msg4008225#msg4008225 date=1338884151]
If I get in, I want to keep the client to be able to emulate from, but I want to make sure I get as much mapdata as possible. afaik you would have to send the construct mapdata packet, but since the client is heavily obfuscated I highly doubt I could find the packet before beta is over (If i’m incorrect, I’m sorry. Not an expert on the subject). Would anyone else be interested in doing this? Since beta is a one time thing and all.
[/quote]

You probably won’t even be able to understand the client even if you got it.[/quote]

Read full topic

item.title: New runescape combat
item.dc:creator: @eyeownyew Eyeownyew
item.description:
@eyeownyew wrote:

[quote=“t4, post:128, topic:442564”][quote author=eyeownyew link=topic=545250.msg4008168#msg4008168 date=1338876173]

it’s a fucking shame that the items and wealth (AND LEVELS) gained by botting are still floating in the economy and the rich remain rich, poor don’t get a fuckin’ thing. if they’re going to change the entire game, just wipe all accounts.

Because that would fix everything, right? [size=1pt]No, that is the worst idea I have ever heard[/size]

But @ the ‘Behind The Scenes’ video…

-They didn’t focus on archery very much. I’m hoping that they aren’t overlooked because range is my favorite combat type
-Mages seem incredibly weak, other than the last hit of 2550 or whatever it was
-What’s up with the guy attacking with what seems like a dragon defender?
-Hopefully there is long-range melee attacks, because getting stunned would be annoying as hell
-Mages teleporting & binding combined with the above seems like a serious PvP problem
[/quote]
you must be one of those who exploited the game ;)[/quote]
How do you come to that conclusion xD

Read full topic

item.title: New runescape combat
item.dc:creator: @eyeownyew Eyeownyew
item.description:
@eyeownyew wrote:

The Wanderer:

All rs members that have been member for a year. I only just bought membership again.

Q: If I missed sign up can I join the Beta at any time in the future? A: Yes, we will be opening up the Beta at weekends for all members. We will be detailing this over the coming weeks.
anyone with 12 or more consecutive months of membership will have full, unlimited access to the beta from day one!

Seems we were both right

Read full topic

item.title: New runescape combat
item.dc:creator: @Kidpaparoach Kidpaparoach
item.description:
@Kidpaparoach wrote:

Melee looks retarded but cool at the same time likewise with range, could use tweaking. Wouldn’t mind them ingame at all. Mage looks fecking awesome.

If they add in an action bar i’ll be quite down… The new combat system as in bleed outs etc is quite cool but I don’t see how they are going to make all the existing equipment work with the new updates. So many armours don’t even have absorbs yet and thats been out for a while.
It is clear they are trying to attract a new player base, rs will either die or become huge in my opinion.
Could be good, could be shit. lets hope its good.

Read full topic

item.title: New runescape combat
item.dc:creator: @T41 t4
item.description:
@T41 wrote:

[quote=“Taharok, post:117, topic:442564”][quote author=imsuperman05 link=topic=545250.msg4007813#msg4007813 date=1338844226]
why do they keep making these stupid changes to make it less like the real runescape i used to know? their making tons of money, why change anything at all
[/quote]

Although somewhat exaggerated, that’s an excellent question imo. Obviously, any of us can only speculate, but this is essentially what I’ve been assuming lately: Jagex lost such a significant portion of their user base after the bot nuke (and will continue to lose them) that they essentially need to keep updating their game to keep old players wanting to play and maybe acquire a new group of RuneScapers in the process. Given that the reasons for botting have been due to the actual mechanics of the game, they have had to make drastic changes to try and target botting at its roots. These have obviously led to some significant changes to the game, which veterans simply hate. Well, that covers combat and skill rebalancing, but not the new armor updates. As far as that goes, I believe Jagex has made the choice of trying to create a new user base instead of trying to save the old one. This allows them to use almost “start fresh” with members. If these members have never had the idea of botting in their minds, they never will because the game will never need them to.

That’s sort of my thought process, anyway. I could go into more bullshit speculation about their financial difficulties as well, but who the hell knows what’s going on there.[/quote]
it’s a fucking shame that the items and wealth (AND LEVELS) gained by botting are still floating in the economy and the rich remain rich, poor don’t get a fuckin’ thing. if they’re going to change the entire game, just wipe all accounts.

Read full topic

Obviously, any of us can only speculate, but this is essentially what I’ve been assuming lately: Jagex lost such a significant portion of their user base after the bot nuke (and will continue to lose them) that they essentially need to keep updating their game to keep old players wanting to play and maybe acquire a new group of RuneScapers in the process. Given that the reasons for botting have been due to the actual mechanics of the game, they have had to make drastic changes to try and target botting at its roots. These have obviously led to some significant changes to the game, which veterans simply hate. Well, that covers combat and skill rebalancing, but not the new armor updates. As far as that goes, I believe Jagex has made the choice of trying to create a new user base instead of trying to save the old one. This allows them to use almost “start fresh” with members. If these members have never had the idea of botting in their minds, they never will because the game will never need them to.

That’s sort of my thought process, anyway. I could go into more bullshit speculation about their financial difficulties as well, but who the hell knows what’s going on there.[/quote]
I think you’re right about the creating a new user base; that’s what it really looks like now.

Read full topic

Obviously, any of us can only speculate, but this is essentially what I’ve been assuming lately: Jagex lost such a significant portion of their user base after the bot nuke (and will continue to lose them) that they essentially need to keep updating their game to keep old players wanting to play and maybe acquire a new group of RuneScapers in the process. These have obviously led to some significant changes to the game, which veterans simply hate. Well, that covers combat and skill rebalancing, but not the new armor updates. item.title: New runescape combat
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

Actually the behind the scenes shows a full length video of the new system and how the abilities will work. Not so much ‘leaked’ as plastered on the front page of the RuneScape webiste.

Read full topic

item.title: New runescape combat
item.dc:creator: @Wet_Dreamss Wet Dreamss
item.description:
@Wet_Dreamss wrote:

Read through all 6 pages of this, and saw that nobody supported the update, other than Davidi2 and some other guy, yet they’ve seen 1 screenshot of what it MIGHT turn out to be like.
While I’m sitting here in reality and notice that we only have 1 screenshot and maybe a :30 video leak of what it might look like. I guarantee that half of you haven’t even seen a picture of it, you just see that Jagex is trying to improve their game with some updates and immediately troll them.

The combat MIGHT not be too bad, I’m almost positive it will make bossing 100000x more fun.

Read full topic
